channel.title: Kingson Chinedu Odogwu's Blog
channel.description: Hi! I am a research assistant and graduate student, studying in the digital forensics and information security space. This is my blog.

item.title: I Upgraded My Website
item.description:
First things first, HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!

In the spirit of newness, I decided to give my website a fresh look, and finally add a blog section to it. I plan on putting up content not at as a thought-leader, but as a learner, who is happy to share things I find interesting and picked up while going through my daily activities.
